verses.verse: A Psalm. <WH4210> O sing <WH7891> unto the LORD <WH3068> a new <WH2319> song; <WH7892> for <WH3588> he hath done <WH6213> marvelous things: <WH6381> his right hand, <WH3225> and his holy <WH6944> arm, <WH2220> hath gotten him the victory. <WH3467>
The LORD <WH3068> hath made known <WH3045> his salvation: <WH3444> his righteousness <WH6666> hath he openly showed <WH1540> in the sight <WH5869> of the heathen. <WH1471>

He hath remembered <WH2142> his mercy <WH2617> and his truth <WH530> toward the house <WH1004> of Israel: <WH3478> all <WH3605> the ends <WH657> of the earth <WH776> have seen <WH7200> <WH853> the salvation <WH3444> of our God. <WH430>
Make a joyful noise <WH7321> unto the LORD, <WH3068> all <WH3605> the earth: <WH776> make a loud noise, <WH6476> and rejoice, <WH7442> and sing praise. <WH2167>
Sing <WH2167> unto the LORD <WH3068> with the harp; <WH3658> with the harp, <WH3658> and the voice <WH6963> of a psalm. <WH2172>
With trumpets <WH2689> and sound <WH6963> of cornet <WH7782> make a joyful noise <WH7321> before <WH6440> the LORD, <WH3068> the King. <WH4428>
Let the sea <WH3220> roar, <WH7481> and the fullness <WH4393> thereof; the world, <WH8398> and they that dwell <WH3427> therein.
Let the floods <WH5104> clap <WH4222> their hands: <WH3709> let the hills <WH2022> be joyful <WH7442> together <WH3162>

Before <WH6440> the LORD; <WH3068> for <WH3588> he cometh <WH935> to judge <WH8199> the earth: <WH776> with righteousness <WH6664> shall he judge <WH8199> the world, <WH8398> and the people <WH5971> with equity. <WH4339>
